title: At a glance weather only appears when on WIFI
content: Weather in At a glance only appears when I'm connected to my home WIFI network. When I switch to the mobile data network, it always disappears after some time (a few minutes to 15 minutes). When I reconnect to my home WIFI network and add the At a glance widget of the Google app, the weather reappears in the At a glance widget (both of them). Then I remove the second At a glance widget and as long as I am connected to my home WIFI, the weather is there and refreshes properly. When I disconnect from the home WIFI again, the weather disappears and so on. Please help. What I've tried: updating and downgrading the Google app, cleaning cache of Google app and Pixel launcher, resetting the Pixel launcher and Google app - nothing helped - this behavior is always present.
